Actions.Name: Cauldron
Actions.Description: The Troll summons a cauldron in range 2. Characters adjacent to the cauldron when it's summoned are shoved 1.

Summons.Name: Cauldron
Summons.Effects: The Cauldron has aura 1. The troll and any of its allies in the aura gain +1 boon on saves, whereas foes gain +1 curse. The Troll gains additional actions when adjacent to its cauldron.

SpecialActions.Name: Strange Brew
SpecialActions.Description: The Troll throws a potion at an ally in range 3, then rolls 1d6.

Rolls.Description: The brew explodes, stunning the ally.
The ally increases in size by +1 for the rest of combat, up to a max of size 3.
The ally immediately clears all conditions, marks, and blights.

SpecialActions.Name: Cauldron Smash
SpecialActions.Description: An adjacent foe is stunned and takes [fray] damage. Unsummon the cauldron.
